‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê NO MORE SWIPING ! Phone rings>pick it up and hold up to your ear>say hello! just like we did with our home phones before they invented cordless. Stock out of the box without changing any settings. Uses proximity sensor. I was a little worried it would automatically answer if I had my phone in my pocket, but that doesn't happen. I also use "WaveUp", which also uses the proximity sensor. No conflicts between the two so far.

So far so good. 10 days and is working fine. Phone is S21+ 5G running Android 12 - app 'optimisation' is off and 'remove permissions' deactivated

I have Umidigi A11 Pro Max which runs stock Android 11. To get it to work, I had to rummage around in phone settings, and the app settings to give it every permission I could find. But that alone was not enough. I also had to go to Settings System DuraSpeed and turn that on. Then there is a long list of applications that you can give permission to, to run in the background. Once I gave this app permission to run in the background, it started to work.
After installing in MIUI 13, it seemed to work fine but now seems to need reactivated every so often. Ridiculous that MIUI doesn't have this function built in anyway.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: I don't have any Xiaomi devices myself, but looking at https://dontkillmyapp.com/xiaomi it could be your device's background process limitations. While I can't confirm it (not having such a device), I would suggest trying if the suggestions from Don't Kill My App helps improve reliability.

google_play_reviews.content: Thank you so much, my 86 year old mother in law can now answer her phone. Can I suggest a few additional features? It would be good if you could add the option to work with a What's app call. Also she keeps turning down the ring volume even though she doesn't mean to, is it possible to ring loud even when the ring volume has been turned down? An option to always use the phones loud speaker facility would be nice.
How do you hang up a call.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: There is no support for hanging up yet, nobody ever asked for this feature before. I'll put it on the todo list, because the idea sounds good.

Nice app need some features

Finally, an oasis in a vast, bare desert! I think I've tried every possible way to get my calls answered by raising the phone to the ear, to no avail though! I've tried automation apps(other than Tasker, which is unnecessarily complicated), a ton of different ,,Air Call,, apps. Nothing would help, except Drupe Dialer(which cannot record calls and has other annoying limitations). But this piece of software does the job adequately! Sylvia van Os, you are the queen of our phones! Best wishes dear!
100 year old mother can now answer her phone, thank you.
Thank you ! Very cool app
Thanks developer but it's slow.
Works great on my good old Pixel2 - kinda like magic when answering calls! (to almost quote a well known guy)

Thank you so much for this app. My son has developed Tardive Dyskinesia as a deeply unfortunate side effect from behavior illness medication. He is unable to use touch screens, and answering phone calls has become increasingly difficult. This app has finally given us the help we needed in order to help him do something so simple for the rest of us.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for sharing this story. While I am very sorry that happened, I am happy to hear that one of my hobby projects has been able to help improve someone's life a bit.

google_play_reviews.content: This app gave my 96 yr old mother-in-law the ability to answer a smart phone. She can't see to answer otherwise. Thank you.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your kind words. Extremely glad to hear it has helped someone stay connected with those who care during these difficult times. Stories like these make all the time spent writing apps like these worth it :)

Not working in Poco F1 android 10, it does beep on test and on calls incoming, but it doesn't helps in answering the call when placed near the ear , or when the phone is raised to ear.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: I have released version 3.3. This fixes compatibility issues with some proximity sensors and could have fixed your issue. Could you please try version 3.3 and see if it works for you?

google_play_reviews.content: Had one false start, where it didn't work while the screen was locked, but afterwards it worked perfectly both when the phone was locked or unlocked. The delays in rejecting or accepting a call seem very well tuned to be short. The in-app interface for controlling behavior is simple and self-explanatory (although the "TEST" button doesn't seem to do anything?). I appreciate the developer linking to the privacy policy to explain the permissions used, as well as publishing the app on F-Droid.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your review. The false start issues should be fixed in the 3.x series (which is now available). The test button should beep and tell you when it detected a pickup or flip over. I hear more people say it doesn't do anything but it does on my device. Glad someone cares about F-Droid too :)

google_play_reviews.content: I would give a 5 star if the beep sound is removed as it sounds bad & also the notification of the app that is "app is enabled" always stay which is annoying. Developer please update.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Your requested features are live since August 19th. Please update and tell me how it works for you and update your review if you are happy with it :)
